Hero.subtitle: Specialized in manufacturing, repairing and modifying metal parts for agricultural and industrial equipment since 1998.

Home.servicesDesc: We provide a comprehensive range of mechanical services designed to minimize downtime and maximize durability for agricultural operators.
Home.introDesc: MANA is more than a workshop. We are a dedicated partner for the agricultural industry, providing technical expertise that keeps your equipment running. From custom part manufacturing to complex mechanical repairs, we deliver reliability that business owners can trust.
Home.feature1Desc: Tailored metal components designed for specialized agricultural machinery.
Home.feature2Desc: Every part undergoes rigorous testing to meet industrial durability standards.
Home.feature3Desc: Decades of solving mechanical challenges with precision and craftsmanship.
Home.noFeaturedProjects: No featured projects yet. Add projects from the admin panel.

CTA.desc: Discuss your mechanical project with our experts. We provide clear, transparent quotes and professional advice for all agricultural equipment needs.

About.storyPara1: MANA was born inside a mechanical workshop where raw metal is transformed into precision components for agricultural equipment. From the beginning, the mission was not only to manufacture parts, but to deliver dependable solutions professionals can rely on every day.
About.storyPara2: The company is built on craftsmanship, patience, and precision â€” values reflected in the quality of every piece produced or repaired. Each task is carried out with respect for the trade, because true workmanship comes from commitment, integrity, and passion.
About.storyPara3: Today, MANA continues to grow while staying true to its roots: providing reliable mechanical solutions and supporting the agricultural sector with dedication and professionalism.
About.coreValuesDesc: The fundamental principles that guide every project we undertake at the
About.precisionDesc: We measure twice and cut once. Accuracy is the foundation of our work.
About.reliabilityDesc: Our repairs are built to withstand the toughest agricultural environments.
About.efficiencyDesc: We understand that downtime costs money. We work fast without skipping quality.
About.partnershipDesc: We build long-term relationships with our clients based on technical trust.

Footer.tagline: Precision machining, repair, and modification of agricultural equipment. Building reliability since 1998.

Contact.contactDesc: Whether you have a technical question or need to schedule a workshop visit, our team is ready to assist you.

Recruitment.recruitmentDesc: We are always looking for skilled machinists, welders, and technicians who value precision and industrial craftsmanship.
Recruitment.whyUsDesc: Working at MANA means solving real-world mechanical problems for the agricultural sector. We provide a professional, structured environment where technical excellence is recognized and rewarded.
Recruitment.spontaneousDesc: If you're a highly skilled technical professional, send us your CV anyway. We're always growing our database of industrial talent.

Services.mainDesc: MANA delivers precision turning and milling solutions for agricultural mechanical parts, focusing on durability, accuracy, and real-world reliability.
Services.ctaDesc: If you have a unique mechanical challenge that falls outside our standard services, contact our engineering team for a custom consultation.
Services.manufacturingDesc: Custom metal component production tailored to agricultural equipment specifications.
Services.restorationDesc: Refurbishing worn parts to extend service life and reduce replacement costs.
Services.modificationDesc: Mechanical adjustments to improve performance or meet operational needs.
Services.machiningDesc: Expert turning and milling operations ensuring consistent industrial quality.
Services.guidanceDesc: Practical advice to support the best mechanical solutions.
